svg.title: Risk-Adjusted Timeline Calculator - Intelligent Risk Assessment & Timeline Optimization
svg.desc: Interactive risk management system with automated timeline adjustment, risk assessment matrix, and predictive analytics for project planning optimization
svg.text: Intelligent Risk Assessment & Timeline Optimization System

rect.aria-label: Medium risk: High probability, low impact
rect.title: Medium Risk: Likely to occur, minimal impact

rect.aria-label: High risk: High probability, medium impact
rect.title: High Risk: Likely to occur, significant impact

rect.aria-label: Critical risk: High probability, high impact
rect.title: Critical Risk: Likely to occur, major impact

rect.aria-label: Low risk: Medium probability, low impact
rect.title: Low Risk: Moderate chance, minimal impact

rect.aria-label: Medium risk: Medium probability, medium impact
rect.title: Medium Risk: Moderate chance, moderate impact

rect.aria-label: High risk: Medium probability, high impact
rect.title: High Risk: Moderate chance, major impact

rect.aria-label: Minimal risk: Low probability, low impact
rect.title: Minimal Risk: Unlikely to occur, minimal impact

rect.aria-label: Low risk: Low probability, medium impact
rect.title: Low Risk: Unlikely to occur, moderate impact

rect.aria-label: Medium risk: Low probability, high impact
rect.title: Medium Risk: Unlikely to occur, major impact

g.text: • Add 2-week buffer for critical path items (Schedule Risk mitigation)
• Schedule technical review session for complex components (Technical Risk mitigation)
• Monitor external API stability weekly (External Risk monitoring)
• Consider parallel development tracks for dependent features
Calculated Buffer: +2.4 weeks | New Delivery: Week 42 | Confidence: 87%

div.style: position: absolute; left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;
div.div: Technical risk assessment including complexity, dependency, and implementation challenges
Resource availability and team capacity risk assessment
Timeline and milestone delivery risk assessment
External dependency and third-party service risk assessment
